ghostPost.title: The origin story
ghostPost.excerpt:
This site exists to help nonprofit organizations to acquire and successfully use
free or cheap technology options. It was born out of frustration: it was really
challenging to get set up and functional.
ghostPost.plaintext:
This site exists to help nonprofit organizations to acquire and successfully use
free or cheap technology options. It was born out of frustration: it was really
challenging to get set up and functional.
